items.title: Case Study - Cyclistic
items.content_text:
Notes on the project Here is a link to my GitHub repository for this project, which includes this markdown document along with the code used in the project.
The Tableau Public page for this project contains all visualisations I created as part of this project (these are also shown in Step 6 of the markdown).
Introduction As the culmination of my study of Google’s Data Analytics Professional Certificate, I carried out a case study as a capstone project to showcase the technical abilities that I learned on the course, as well as my understanding of the data analysis process.
